au.edu.rmit.agtgrp.apparate.gui.simviewer.view

Class MapInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Panel
          • au.edu.rmit.agtgrp.apparate.gui.simviewer.view.MapInstance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, Accessible

    public class MapInstance
extends Panel
    The interface for a single model Holds all users preference for this map Also defines the appearance of the map
    Author:
    Andy Xie
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                                    boolean blocked)

        Parameters:
        x - x value of coordinate
        y - y value of coordinate
        blocked - whether (x,y) has to be set as "blocked" (otherwise set as traversable)
